articles.author: Todd Frankel, Shawn Boburg, Josh Dawsey, Ashley Parker, Alex Horton
articles.title: How the AR-15 became a powerful political, cultural symbol in America - The Washington Post
articles.description: The AR-15 wasn’t supposed to be a best-seller. It's the result of a dramatic shift in American gun culture fueled by the firearms industry and its allies.
articles.content:
A series examining the AR-15, a weapon with a singular hold on a divided nation
About the terminology
